amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit the Bureau of Land Management from finalizing, implementing, administering, or enforcing its proposed Western Solar Plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
